import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { EmployeeService } from '../employee.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { constructor(private employeeService: EmployeeService, private router: Router){} }
